QuestData.Title: Ample Inspiration
QuestData.Description: Wow! That stuff is nasty. Not to account for gnoll taste or anything, but I figured whatever they had would at least be... edible?$B$BLet's get more creative.$B$BTore's got an explosive dispenser north of town... not far from the big cavern entrance, can't miss it. I'm sure she intends them for mining purposes of some sort, but I've got a better idea.$B$BGrab one of those things and rush it to one of the nearby mammoths... most of them are to the west. Collect the meat, bring it back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ricket at K3 wants you to retrieve a U.D.E.D, use it to blow up a mammoth, and retrieve 8 Hearty Mammoth Meat.
QuestData.CompletionText: I know my plan was brilliant. Don't even worry about it.$B$BDoes it feel good to be in the presence of greatness? A little tingly maybe?
QuestData.RewardText: And it's already well-done! I outdo myself sometimes.$B$BThanks much, friend!
